title: Boards stop showing conversations when I log in
body:
When I'm not logged in, the boards display correctly - showing conversations, letting me minimize parent threads, etc.

When I log in, all comments just show in a single list like it's an old-style forum rather than a Reddit-style board. 

Is there a setting or something I need to change to fix this?

replies.body:
It sounds like you have 'chronological view' enabled on your boards account. You can simply click the option on any post to switch to 'Discussion view'. 

Here's a screenshot to show what I mean (click to enlarge)

http://i.imgur.com/CdiEgT9.png

Let me know if this helped resolve it. :)
Thank you kindly; the boards are making sense to me now!

Throwing out stale cookies from your browsers will likely help. [You can use the Cookie Crumbler to help you.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies)
